text: Soni chilikati cha wandu pana jwaakunâ€™galagatilaga Allah chanchisegambali (mwakayichila), basi naga yimpatile yambone, jukasatulalila nayo (ni kuwa mpela nsilamu nsyesyene), nambo naga gampatile masausyo, jukasagalauka ni ngope jakwe (jukasaujilaga ku ukafili wakwe), jupelelwe duniya ni Akhera, kwalakweko ni kupelelwa kwakuonechela
